text: Jeroen Bijl (born 5 September 1966 in Rotterdam) is a Dutch former volleyball player who played for the national team. After his sport career he became director of PEC Zwolle. He is the current chef de mission of NOC*NSF and within this function the main person responsible for the Dutch team at the 2018 Winter Olympics.Bobo met klein ego leidt olympische ploeg Het Financieele DagbladChef de mission Jeroen Bijl na Winterspelen weg bij NOCNSF De Volkskrant ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch men's volleyball players Category:Sportspeople from Rotterdam
title: Jeroen Bijl
